QuestData.Title: Mawsworn Battle Plans
QuestData.Description:
Which is more damaging to the enemy, destroying a contingent of their forces or interrupting their communications?
Better yet, what if that communication allows you to best place your forces to ambush their reinforcements?
I see you understand. There will be a Mawsworn lieutenant, Voxiferus, traveling from the Maw into Korthia, by way of the northern road. Find them, kill them, and bring me the battle plans.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This imposing general ferries Mawsworn battle plans between the Maw and Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText: Again, you survive. You remind me of me. I will review these plans and inform our companions.
